markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Marbles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1336)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 58</row>

**Price** 2 sp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These tiny round balls are made of polished stone and colorful glass, and come in a bag of 200. You can pour marbles in an empty square adjacent to you with an Interact action. The first creature that moves into that square must succeed at a DC 13 [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check or Reflex save (its choice) or fall [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). Once a creature enters a space with marbles, enough marbles are scattered that other creatures moving into that space don't need to attempt a roll to avoid falling. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Marbles

text: <title level="1" right="Item 0" pfs="Standard" > Marbles Source Grand Bazaar pg. 58 Price 2 sp Hands 1 Usage held in 1 hand Bulk L --- These tiny round balls are made of polished stone and colorful glass, and come in a bag of 200. You can pour marbles in an empty square adjacent to you with an Interact action. The first creature that moves into that square must succeed at a DC 13 Acrobatics check or Reflex save (its choice) or fall prone. Once a creature enters a space with marbles, enough marbles are scattered that other creatures moving into that space don't need to attempt a roll to avoid falling.
